name: Vendor Name 2
description: "name 2 associated with the business partner identifier in SAP for the company that supplied goods to Rockwell Automation to fulfill a purchase order (such as DO NOT USE, DO NOT USE - INACTIVE, or INDUSTRIALS CONTROLS DIVISION), stored as a string

For a stock transfer order (where one Rockwell Automation location receives the product from another plant or distribution center), the Vendor Business Partner Identifier is a Rockwell Automation (internal) business partner identifier."
